feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.7
entry.content:
Fixes an issue with Linux nodes that had to use relay with eBPF for connectivity where reconnections caused the proxy to stop forwarding packets.

What's Changed

  • Don't cancel proxy context on conn close by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1986

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.6...v0.27.7

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • CentOS installations might have "apt" as "annotation processing tool"â€¦ by @thorleifjacobsen in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1955
  • Add installer support for Synology by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1984
  • Implement PostgreSQL store support by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1939
  • Refactor network monitor to wait for stop by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1992
  • Enable nameserver deactivation if unresponsive on iOS by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1982
  • Increase garbage collection on ios by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1981
  • Update the GUI status when the daemon is unavailable by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2012
  • Gracefully conn worker shutdown by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2022
  • Store location information in peer event meta by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1994
  • Add dummy ipv6 to macos interface by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2025
  • use the next available port for Wireguard by @mattkasun in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2024
  • Increase the status checks timeout by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2033
  • Accept any XDG_ environment variable to determine desktop by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2037
  • Fix the initial daemon retry interval by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2036
  • Return the proper error when a peer is deleted by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2035
  • Enhance firewall manager checks to detect unsupported iptables by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2038
  • Log global lock acquisition per user by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2039

New Contributors

  • @thorleifjacobsen made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1955
  • @mattkasun made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2024

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.7...v0.27.8

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Accept any XDG_ environment variable to determine desktop" by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2042

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.8...v0.27.9

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use info log-level for firewall manager discover by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2045
  • Restore netbird state and log level after debug by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2047
  • Extend integrated validator with error handling by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2044
  • Remove extra error mapping by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2050
  • fix a typo in CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2048
  • Refactor firewall manager check by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2054
  • Upgrade gRPC and OpenTelemetry packages for compatibility by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2003
  • Don't allow delete group from peer groups by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2055
  • Add extra logs for account not found, peer login and getAccount by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2053

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.9...v0.27.10

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.28.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add FindExistingPostureCheck by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2075
  • Fix PKCE auth html by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2079
  • Improve login performance by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2061
  • Fill the UI version info in system meta on Android by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2077
  • Prevent using expired ctx when sending metrics by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2088
  • Ignore candidates whose IP falls into a routed network by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2084
  • Add missing openid scope when requesting JWT token in Zitadel by @glaeqen in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2089
  • Remove unused variables from peer conn by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2074
  • Respect env for debug and routes sub commands by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2026
  • Do not use SO_MARK in case of netstack mode. by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2104
  • Use forked go-netroute by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2115
  • Add basic signal metrics by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2107
  • Optimize JWT Group Sync by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2108
  • Prevent building test code for client by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2125
  • Deprecate FileStore engine support by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2119
  • Release 0.28.0 by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2092
  • Fix checkFileAndProcess function on FreeBSD by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2128
  • Enable network monitoring for Windows and macOS clients by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2126
  • Add freebsd test workflow by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2127
  • fix network monitor ref check by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2133
  • Allow candidates on local routes if more specific than vpn routes by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2097
  • Trim new line char from Android version by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2147
  • Fix capacity of slice by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2148
  • Fix store migration on empty string by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2149
  • Use any as source for the firewall for routed networks by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2134
  • Update configuration options for client UI by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2139
  • Process routes before peers by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2105
  • Remove whitespace at the end of a line by @Yxnt in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2152

New Contributors

  • @glaeqen made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2089
  • @Yxnt made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2152

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.10...v0.28.0
